des: "This is an all purpose spice mix to use on chicken or vegetables. My favorite use to to sprinkle liberally on chicken legs before grilling or baking. Add a dash to green beans, broccoli, or mashed potatoes for extra flavor."
ins: Mix the chicken bouillon granules, garlic powder, onion powder, and paprika in a bowl until well blended. Store the seasoning blend in an airtight container.
